storytelling_templates.formal_opening: 昔々あるところに (Once upon a time...)

character_speech_patterns.child: uses dictionary forms / playful particles like 'yo' or 'ne'

naming.locked_behavior: Bowing as a greeting; removal of outdoor shoes (replaced by indoor slippers/uwabaki).

protagonist.base: Constant: Japanese features, large expressive eyes, same face shape.
protagonist.boy: Outfit: Navy blue Randoseru, yellow safety school hat, crisp white polo, dark shorts. Hair: straight jet black with a sharp fringe.
protagonist.girl: Outfit: Navy blue school skirt, yellow safety school hat, crisp white polo. Hair: straight jet black with fringe and yellow hairbands.

characters.support: Elderly Japanese person. HAIR: Minimalist receding silver hair. OUTFIT: Grey linen cardigan, pressed trousers, clean white socks (tabi-style), simple wire-rimmed glasses.

architecture.style: Modern Japanese urban or Machiya style. Clean wooden lines, sliding Shoji screens.

visual_identity.environment: Soft morning light, manicured pine trees, cherry blossoms (Sakura), or perfectly clean grey asphalt with bright white painted lines.

clothing.men: Business-casual linen shirts or traditional dark Yukata.
clothing.women: Simple modest dresses or colorful Kimono with Obi sash.
clothing.children: School uniforms (Randoseru) or simple, high-quality basics.

locked: Blue Shinkansen train in far background

urban_settings.busy_road: Narrow paved streets, high-speed trains, cyclists with baskets, neat yellow tactile paving at crossings.
urban_settings.neighborhood: Vending machines on every corner, small community shrines, overhead wires in neat bundles.

negatives.emotion_guideline: Stoic warmth, quiet discipline, deep respect for elders.

character_anchors.support: Constant: Grey linen cardigan, wire-rimmed glasses, silver receding hair, calm expression.

plot_anchors.crossing_in_progress: Composition: Boy and elderly man WALKING TOGETHER at a neat paved crossing. Cars stopped in background.
plot_anchors.crossing_completed: Composition: Boy and elderly man have ARRIVED on the opposite sidewalk. The crossing is behind them.
plot_anchors.greeting: Composition: Boy performing a slight bow (ojigi). Elderly man nodding warmly. Clean residential background.
